priceNotes: Averages from 2025 menus and recent cruiser reports; ship/itinerary can vary by ~$0.50–$1.00 per item.
Starbucks-branded venues and Desserted milkshake shops are excluded from package coverage.
Package pricing is dynamic; use the page's 'Edit Price' to override per-day cost for your sailing.

items.name: Milkshake
items.notes: Johnny Rockets typical; Desserted on Icon-class may be higher.

items.name: Fresh-squeezed Juice
items.notes: Orange, grapefruit, mixed blends; ~8–12 oz servings.

items.name: Mocktail / Non-alcoholic Cocktail
items.notes: Virgin mixed drinks; included in Refreshment/Deluxe.

items.name: Wine (by the glass)
items.notes: House to premium by the glass.

items.name: Cocktail
items.notes: Standard mixed drinks; super-premium above cap may cost extra.

items.name: Whiskey/Spirit (single pour)
items.notes: Neat or on rocks; premium brands higher.

packages.name: Classic Soda Package
description: Unlimited fountain sodas & Coca-Cola Freestyle refills
Excludes premium coffee/tea, fresh juice, milkshakes, bottled water, alcohol

packages.name: Refreshment Package
description: All Soda items plus premium coffees/teas, fresh-squeezed juices
Bottled still/sparkling water; smoothies & shakes (venue dependent)

packages.name: Deluxe Beverage Package
description: All Refreshment items plus beer, wine by the glass (up to price cap), cocktails/spirits/liqueurs
Typical per-drink cap around $14; pay the difference above cap
Venue exceptions apply (e.g., Starbucks, Desserted milkshakes)
exclusions: Super-premium drinks above cap pay difference

_comment.about: JSON-first dataset for the drink calculator. Clone this file for other lines.
how_to_add_a_line: Update 'line', 'packagesCardTitle', 'items', and 'packages' with that line's details.
Wire the cruise line pill's data-src to the new JSON path so it loads on click.
Service worker can prefetch these JSON URLs for offline-friendly performance.

prompts.for_chatgpt: Summarize {CRUISE_LINE} 2025 beverage package tiers (names, per-day price range, inclusions/exclusions, caps/limits, venue exceptions) and typical individual drink prices (soda, specialty coffee, milkshake, fresh juice, beer, wine by glass, cocktail, whiskey). Return JSON in the provided schema.
prompts.for_grok: Collect latest menus and 2025 price reports for {CRUISE_LINE}. Confirm dynamic ranges for each package tier and average à-la-carte drink prices. Note ship-class/venue exceptions. Provide short bullet points suitable for the 'description' arrays.
